contactText: Write me a quick E-Mail or hit me up on one of the usual Social Media Sites.
404: This page does not exist, go back to home

packageman.dialogText1: You have a limited time to fill your Van with packages, and your shift ends once the Van has reached the end of the Road. You have 5 days of work, from Monday - Friday. Each day is on a random map, at different times of day. Prove your capabilities by smashing as many doors, windows and garages as you can.
packageman.dialogText2: You have a limited time to fill your Van with packages, and your shift ends once the Van has reached the end of the Road. You have 5 days of work, from Monday - Friday. Each day is on a random map, at different times of day. Prove your capabilities by smashing as many doors, windows and garages as you can.
packageman.cardText: Get packages. Throw packages. Get money. Done.

sunday.dialogText1: This is a story about you discovering an unfamiliar place, with unfamiliar inhabitants. The sun is out to kill you, the shadows are the only safe place. The inhabitants of this world also hide in the shadows, but they are a lot smaller than you.
sunday.cardText: Very blinding. Deadly Enviroment. Small friends.

trapped.dialogText1: Sanity is ofter overrated. Who needs it, am I right? Playing this game will let you experience total isolation in an unpleasant manner. If you can manage to stay inside your Room, you might just uncover some secrets
trapped.cardText: Insane in the membrane, insane in the brain.

paragraph.title: About Me
paragraph.textBlock: I am a Web Designer, Game Developer and Artist, with experience in managing small and big projects. My background in User Interface, User Experience and Design support my mindful but competitive approach.

paragraph2.title: My Services
paragraph2.textBlock: If you need a website for yourself or your company, an avatar for your social media site, or just general tips/advice for creating an online presence: Then I'm your guy!
